Plot: A young woman, recently released from a mental hospital, gets a job as a secretary to a demanding lawyer, where their employer-employee relationship turns into a sexual, sadomasochistic one.
Title: Secretary
Writer: Erin Cressida Wilson (screenplay), Mary Gaitskill (short story), Steven Shainberg (story adaptation), Erin Cressida Wilson (story adaptation)
Actors: James Spader, Maggie Gyllenhaal, Jeremy Davies, Lesley Ann Warren
tomatoConsensus: Maggie Gyllenhaal impresses in this romantic comedy with a kinky twist.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 15 wins & 25 nominations.
